item.title: FO - User account - Credit Slips - Consult credit slip list & View PDF Credit slip & View order
item.description: FO - User account - Credit Slips - Consult credit slip list & View PDF Credit slip & View order Details Component : Core Status : IN REVIEW Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-8336 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Sign with default customer The Home page is well displayed Click on View my customer account Your account page is displayed Click on “Credit slips” The Credit slips page is well displayed and the information alert “You have not received any credit slips.
